overview: Daniel Gilman is the co-founder and Chief Information Officer of RxVantage. Mr. Gilman has over five years of tech and pharmaceutical sales experience, and was a professional sales representative at Boehringer Ingelheim Pharmaceuticals Inc., the largest privately held, and fastest growing pharmaceutical company in the world. Prior to joining Boehringer-Ingelheim, Mr. Gilman was a worked in IT/IS at Netivity Solutions, Inc., a provider of high-tech networking solutions in Boston, MA. Danâ€™s clients included a wide array of Fortune 500 companies, nationwide managed care organizations and the largest healthcare provider network in Boston, MA.
